description: Voice Loop MVP complete with tests

acceptance_criteria_met: User can click Talk button to start voice session
Microphone captures and streams audio to server via WebSocket
Server forwards audio to OpenAI Realtime API
Assistant voice response streams back and plays
User can interrupt assistant audio by speaking (barge-in)
Latency metrics captured (TTFB, turn latency, barge-in)
Unit tests for server (24 tests passing)
Unit tests for client (41 tests passing)
